task.title: Creating a Board
task.shortdesc: This task allows you to create an empty board on monday.com. This is an essential task in using the website and you have to do this to use most features of the site. This task will have you create, name, and set the visibility opf a board.

taskbody.context: Boards on monday.com are used to contain different projects. You can allow different people access to different boards so that only people who are on a project have access to the board. You want to give a name to the blank board because the name will help distinguish it from other boards. You want to make the board visible if you are ready to reveal the project and you want to make the board invisible if you don't want others to have access to it yet.

step.cmd: From the homepage click on the blue "+" button on the upper left side of the screen.
You may choose any of the following options: "Blank Board," "Choose From Template," "Import," "New Folder"
A new board will be created based on the option that you selected.
